Html: Hi guys I downloaded the new release of rawr the other day and put my current cat build into it to see if any entry zone quests gave improvements, and I noticed something strange. Rawr says that I should have 5k ap but I only have about 3700 in cat form. Have any idea why rawr is giving me credit for more AP then I should have?
Rawr models level 80 combat. At level 80, your AP will be higher.
